summary: An American naval officer is recruited for an operation to eliminate his lookalike, the infamous terrorist Carlos The Jackal.
cast: Aidan Quinn|Donald Sutherland|Ben Kingsley|Claudia Ferri|Céline Bonnier|Vlasta Vrana|Liliana Komorowska|Von Flores|Al Waxman|Mitchell David Rothpan|Gregory Hlady|Gabriel Marian Oseciuc|Frédéric Desager|Kliment Denchev|Yonathan Gordon|Ndiouga Sarr|Manuel Aranguiz|Leni Parker|Jacques Lavallée|David Francis|Goûchy Boy|Tim Post|Daniel Pilon|Richard Jutras|Hisham Zayed|Ted Whittall|Francis Delvecchio|Lisa Wegner|Lucie Laurier|Neil Kroetsch|Matthew Dupuis|Paul Stewart|Claude Genest|Michael Caloz|David Franco|Heinz Becker|Louis Bouchard|Mark Knoeffel|Andréas Lange|Martin Morf
title: Caza al terrorista
